CAR: CPLE - Duke Energy Progress East,CPLW - Duke Energy Progress West,DUK - Duke Energy Carolinas,SC - South Carolina Public Service Authority,SCEG - South Carolina Electric & Gas Company
CENT: SPA - Southwestern Power Administration,SWPP - Southwest Power Pool
